example: My brother is younger than me.
My grandmother is older than my grandfather.
Tom is taller than his best friend.

meaning: 更矮的；更短的（short的比较级）
example: This pencil is shorter than that one.
The red rope is longer than the blue one.

meaning: 更瘦的；更薄的（thin的比较级）
example: The cat is thinner than it was last month.
This box is heavier than the bag.
The elephant is bigger than the tiger.
The ant is smaller than the bee.
My father is stronger than my uncle.
We saw a dinosaur model in the museum.
The meeting will be held in the school hall.
The tree is about five metres tall.
She runs faster than me.
Both Lucy and Lily like dancing.
My schoolbag weighs three kilograms.
We spent our holiday in the countryside.

meaning: 更低的；更低地（low的比较级）
example: The temperature today is lower than yesterday.
Our shadows are longer in the evening.
The new robot is smarter than the old one.
He wants to become a doctor when he grows up.

meaning: 打扫；清洁（clean的过去式/过去分词）
example: I cleaned my room yesterday afternoon.

meaning: 停留；待（stay的过去式/过去分词）
example: She stayed at home last Sunday.
My mother washed the clothes this morning.

meaning: 看；观看（watch的过去式/过去分词）
example: We watched a film together last night.

meaning: 有；经历；得病（have的过去式/过去分词）
example: He had a busy weekend.
I had a cold and stayed in bed for two days.

meaning: 睡觉（sleep的过去式/过去分词）
example: I slept well last night.

meaning: 读；阅读（read的过去式/过去分词）
example: She read a storybook before going to bed.
I saw a beautiful bird in the park yesterday.
We met each other last week.
Yesterday was my birthday.
I had never been to Beijing before.
He drank a glass of milk this morning.
There will be a talent show in our school.
My father likes reading sports magazines.
Her English is better than mine.
He runs faster than any other student in his class.
We stayed in a nice hotel during our trip.

meaning: 修理；安装（fix的过去式/过去分词）
example: My father fixed the broken bike yesterday.
The window is broken. We need to fix it.
There is a lamp on my desk.
Please don't be so loud. The baby is sleeping.
I enjoy listening to music in my free time.
We went to the zoo last Saturday.
We set up a tent at the camp.
My family went camping in the mountains last month.
He likes to fish by the river on weekends.
My grandfather and I went fishing yesterday.
She rode a bike to school this morning.

meaning: 受伤；使疼痛（过去式/过去分词同形）
example: He hurt his leg when he played football.
We ate delicious food at the restaurant.
She took many photos during her trip.
We took pictures in front of the Great Wall.
My mother bought a new dress for me.
I received a nice gift on my birthday.
She fell down when she was running.
The book fell off the desk.
We have a holiday on Labour Day.
We saw a mule on the farm.
Turpan is famous for its grapes.
He could swim when he was five years old.
We waited till he came back.
We played on the beach all afternoon.
She put the apples in a basket.
He played an important part in the play.
The dog licked my hand.

meaning: 笑；发笑（laugh的过去式/过去分词）
example: We laughed at the funny story.
We have lunch in the school dining hall.
The grass in the park is green and soft.
We have PE class in the gym.
I met her three years ago.
Cycling is good exercise.
We often go cycling in the park.
She can ice-skate very well.
We play badminton after school.
There are many stars in the sky at night.
This math problem is easy.
You can look up new words in a dictionary.
We can get information from the Internet.
These two books are different.
He is an active student in class.
He won the 100-meter race.

meaning: 没有什么；没有一件东西
example: There is nothing in the box.

meaning: 想；认为（think的过去式/过去分词）
example: I thought he was a good student.

meaning: 感觉（feel的过去式/过去分词）
example: I felt happy when I heard the news.
The cheetah is the fastest animal on land.
She tripped and fell on the floor.
I woke up early this morning.
I had a good dream last night.
